title: Delete Account
subtitle: This action is irreversible. Please read the consequences carefully before proceeding.

warning.title: ⚠️ Warning
warning.content: Deleting your account will result in the following consequences:
consequences: All your personal data will be permanently deleted
Your files and documents will be lost
Your history and settings will be erased

confirmation.title: Email Confirmation
confirmation.message: To confirm deletion, please enter your email address:
confirmation.error: The email address does not match your account

dialog.title: Final Confirmation
dialog.message: Are you absolutely sure you want to delete your account? This action is irreversible.

success.title: Account Deleted
success.message: Your account has been successfully deleted. You will be redirected to the homepage...

error.title: Error
error.generic: We were unable to delete your account. Please try again later or contact support.
